A

Ability - Class in harkadventurer.model
Ability-type objects store all information pertaining to an ability, including its name, base damage, dice, targeting and effect.
Ability() - Constructor for class harkadventurer.model.Ability
Constructs an ability object with no name, effect and targeting, with a base damage of 0 and 0 2-sided dice.
Ability(AbilityEffect, String, TargetingStrategy, int, int, int) - Constructor for class harkadventurer.model.Ability
Constructs an ability object initialized with the given effect, name, target, base effect and dice.
AbilityEffect - Interface in harkadventurer.control
Classes that define an ability's effect should implement this interface.
AbilityException - Exception in harkadventurer.excep
Thrown when an ability is given an invalid input, or when an Ability file is incorrectly formatted.
AbilityException(String) - Constructor for exception harkadventurer.excep.AbilityException
Constructs an AbilityException with the specified message.
AbilityFactory - Class in harkadventurer.control
A factory for constructing Ability-class objects.
AbilityFactory() - Constructor for class harkadventurer.control.AbilityFactory
 
abilityMenu(LinkedList<Ability>) - Method in class harkadventurer.view.UI
Prompts the player to select an ability or cancel.
addAbility(Ability) - Method in class harkadventurer.model.Character
Adds an ability to the character's list of abilities.
addCharacter(Character) - Method in class harkadventurer.model.Team
Adds a character to the team.

C

changeHealth(int) - Method in class harkadventurer.model.Character
Changes the character's current health by the input amount.
changeHealth(int) - Method in interface harkadventurer.model.Targetable
Applies a specified amount of damage or healing to the target.
changeHealth(int) - Method in class harkadventurer.model.Team
Changes the health of all characters in the team by the specified amount.
Character - Class in harkadventurer.model
Character-type objects store a character's name, maximum health, current health and list of abilities.
Character() - Constructor for class harkadventurer.model.Character
Constructs a character object with 1 hit point and no abilities or observers.
Character(String, int, LinkedList<Ability>) - Constructor for class harkadventurer.model.Character
Constructs a character object with the input name, hit points and abilities.
CharacterException - Exception in harkadventurer.excep
Thrown when a character is given an invalid input, or when a character file is incorrectly formatted.
CharacterException(String) - Constructor for exception harkadventurer.excep.CharacterException
Constructs a CharacterException with the specified message.
CharacterFactory - Class in harkadventurer.control
A factory for constructing Character-type objects.
CharacterFactory() - Constructor for class harkadventurer.control.CharacterFactory
 
createAbility(char, char) - Method in class harkadventurer.control.AbilityFactory
Constructs an ability based on the input chars.
createCharacter(char) - Method in class harkadventurer.control.CharacterFactory
Constructs a character based on the input char.

D

Damage - Class in harkadventurer.control
Contains the execution logic for abilities that damage characters.
Damage() - Constructor for class harkadventurer.control.Damage
 

E

endGame(Team) - Method in class harkadventurer.view.UI
Congratulates the victorious team on their glorious triumph.
enemyDeathUpdate(double) - Method in interface harkadventurer.model.EnemyObserver
This method is called when an enemy character is killed.
enemyDeathUpdate(double) - Method in class harkadventurer.model.Team
Called when a member of the enemy team dies, heals all characters in the team.
EnemyObserver - Interface in harkadventurer.model
A class can implement the EnemyObserver interface when it wants to be informed of the death of enemy characters.

F

FileLoader - Class in harkadventurer.control
FileLoader objects read Character and Ability txt files and convert them into characters and abilities.
FileLoader(CharacterFactory, AbilityFactory, TeamManager) - Constructor for class harkadventurer.control.FileLoader
Constructs a new FileLoader that uses the specified factories.
friendlyDeathUpdate() - Method in interface harkadventurer.model.FriendlyObserver
This method is called when a friendly character is killed.
friendlyDeathUpdate() - Method in class harkadventurer.model.Team
Called when a member of the team dies, removes the dead character from the team's character list.
FriendlyObserver - Interface in harkadventurer.model
A class can implement the FriendlyObserver interface when it wants to be informed of the death of friendly characters.

G

GameController - Class in harkadventurer.control
A GameController object manages the game.
GameController(UI, FileLoader, ObjectIO) - Constructor for class harkadventurer.control.GameController
Constructs a GameController that uses the specified user interface, file loader and object loader.

Returns a list of the character's abilities.

Returns the ability's base damage.

Returns the character's current health.
getEffect() - Method in class harkadventurer.model.Ability
Returns the ability's effect.

Returns a list of the character's enemy observers.
getFriendlyObservers() - Method in class harkadventurer.model.Character
Returns a list of the character's friendly observers.
getMaxHealth() - Method in class harkadventurer.model.Character
Returns the character's maximum health.
getName() - Method in class harkadventurer.model.Ability
Returns the ability's name.
getName() - Method in class harkadventurer.model.Character
Returns the character's name.
getName() - Method in class harkadventurer.model.Team

getNumDice() - Method in class harkadventurer.model.Ability

getTarget() - Method in class harkadventurer.model.Ability
Returns the ability's targeting strategy.
getTargets(Team, LinkedList<Team>) - Method in interface harkadventurer.control.TargetingStrategy
When provided with a list of allies and enemies, will return a list of valid targets for an ability.
getTargets(Team, LinkedList<Team>) - Method in class harkadventurer.control.TargetMultiAlly
Returns all valid targets of an ability, in this case, the allied team.
getTargets(Team, LinkedList<Team>) - Method in class harkadventurer.control.TargetMultiEnemy
Returns all valid targets of an ability, in this case, all enemy teams.
getTargets(Team, LinkedList<Team>) - Method in class harkadventurer.control.TargetSingleAlly
Returns all valid targets of an ability, in this case, all allies characters.
getTargets(Team, LinkedList<Team>) - Method in class harkadventurer.control.TargetSingleEnemy
Returns all valid targets of an ability, in this case, all enemy characters.
getTypeDice() - Method in class harkadventurer.model.Ability
Returns the number of faces on the dice the ability rolls.

T

Targetable - Interface in harkadventurer.model
A class that implements the Targetable interface can be targeted by abilities.
TargetingStrategy - Interface in harkadventurer.control
Classes that define an ability's target selection should implement this interface.
targetMenu(LinkedList<Targetable>) - Method in class harkadventurer.view.UI
Prompts the player to choose a target for an ability.

Team - Class in harkadventurer.model
Team-type objects have a name and store a list of characters.

Constructs a team with the specified name and no characters.
Team(String, LinkedList<Character>) - Constructor for class harkadventurer.model.Team
Constructs a team with the specified name, containing the characters in the provided list.
